Package com.method5.jot.rpc

Class Api

java.lang.Object
com.method5.jot.rpc.Api
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
Direct Known Subclasses:
NopApi, PolkadotRpc, PolkadotWs
public abstract class Api extends Object implements AutoCloseable
PolkadotClient — class for polkadot client in the Jot SDK. Provides RPC client / JSON‑RPC integration.
